HYDRATED LIME

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ width=”90%” max_width=”95%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”61px||10px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.gmciltd.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Hydrated-lime.jpeg” title_text=”Hydrated lime” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”center” align_last_edited=”on|tablet” _builder_version=”4.4.7″ custom_padding=”||0px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|50|50|100|4|0|0″ global_colors_info=”{}” filter_hue_rotate__hover_enabled=”off|desktop” filter_hue_rotate__hover=”31deg”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.6em” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We provide customers with top-quality Hydrated Lime Powder as a noteworthy organization. Hydrated lime powder for water treatment plants and effluent treatment plants is made from high grade ingredients. In addition, pH regulation, food industry, leather industry and paint industries are highly needed in hydrated lime powder.

Our team’s expertise in the production of Hydrated Lime has facilitated us to deliver quality Lime products to some of the most trusted customers across the country with their full satisfaction.

Lime Powder
In India, we are known for being one of the leading producers of Lime Powder. The Lime Compound is used in compound shape and with a formula of Ca(OH)2. The calcium powder we give is pure, due to the variable content between 96% and 70%.

Slaked Lime
We are one of India’s leading producers of Slaked Lime. Powder is available in slaked lime with Ca(OH)2 formula. Due to the varying content from 96% to 70% we are offering white slaked lime.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ max_width=”95%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”61px||10px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004b4f” text_font_size=”18px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.6em” header_font=”|||on|||||” header_6_font=”Lato|700||on|||||” header_6_text_color=”#004b4f” header_6_font_size=”25px” header_6_line_height=”1.5em” custom_padding=”||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”20px|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”off|desktop” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_6_font_size_tablet=”24px” header_6_font_size_phone=”24px” header_6_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_orientation_tablet=”left” text_orientation_phone=”left” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Key Features
  • Accurate composition
  • Used in pesticides and fertilizers
  • Contents varying from 90% to 70%
  • Accurate composition
  • Precise pH value
  • High effectiveness
  • Accurate composition
  • Long shelf life
  • Purity

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”18px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.6em” header_6_font=”Lato|700|||||||” header_6_text_color=”#004b4f” header_6_font_size=”25px” header_6_line_height=”1.5em” custom_padding_tablet=”|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”20px|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”off|desktop” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_6_font_size_tablet=”24px” header_6_font_size_phone=”24px” header_6_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_orientation_tablet=”left” text_orientation_phone=”left” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

SPECIFICATION

Hydrated Lime/Slaked Lime
Ca(OH)2 90% 85% 80% 75% 70%
CaO 68% 64% 60.50% 56.70% 52.90%
Calcium Carbonate CaCO3 2% 4% 6% 8% 12%
Magnesium Oxide MgO 0.40% 0.40% 1% 1% 1%
Acid Insoluble SiO2 0.40% 1.20% 2.50% 4% 6%
Alumina Al2O3 0.05% 0.10% 0.15% 0.20% 0.25%
Iron Fe2O3 0.05% 0.10% 0.15% 0.20% 0.25%
Moisture 0.50% 0.50% 0.50% 0.50% 0.50%
Mesh (BSS) 250 200 175 150 150
